description: To address CVE-2023-36405, Microsoft has released a set of security updates that require installation. Affected systems include various build numbers of Windows Server 2016, 2022, and Windows 10 and 11 across both x64 and 32-bit architectures. The following KB articles are crucial for obtaining the updates: KB5032192, KB5032190, KB5032189, and KB5032197. It is essential for system administrators to apply these updates using their respective update packages from links such as https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032197 and https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032192. These updates should be applied promptly to ensure systems are secure and protected from the exploitation of this elevation of privilege vulnerability.
